thread.title: Baton Rouge Police searching for woman who stole from multiple pawn shops

author: @WBRZ
title: Baton Rouge Police searching for woman who stole from multiple pawn shops
text: 73° Latest Weather Blog Baton Rouge Police searching for woman who stole from multiple pawn shops BATON ROUGE — Baton Rouge Police are attempting to identify a woman responsible for multiple pawn store thefts. The woman responsible for stealing from multiple local pawn shops on April 15, the Baton Rouge Police Department said. Trending News She is believed to be travelling in a white Mercedes Benz SUV.
